title: Office Supplies Quiz
description: How well do you know everyday office supplies? Test your recall of the items found in desks and supply closets.

questions.question: What office supply uses a spring-loaded mechanism to bind papers together with a thin wire?
Which office item is a small, rectangular block used to remove pencil marks from paper?
What is a three-hole punch used for?
options: Punching holes in paper for binder storage

questions.question: Which office supply is a transparent adhesive film on a roll, often called by the brand name Scotch?
What is a letter opener used for?
Which office product is a small pad of paper with a lightly adhesive strip on the back, often yellow?
What does a paper shredder do?
options: Cuts paper into strips or confetti for secure disposal

questions.question: Which item is a flat, spring-loaded metal clip used to hold thick stacks of paper together?
What is a highlighter pen used for?
options: Marking text with bright, transparent color for emphasis

questions.question: Which office supply is a circular device with a built-in blade used to cut paper in a straight line?
What is white-out (correction fluid) used for?
options: Covering up written or typed mistakes on paper

questions.question: Which item is a metal or plastic container that holds multiple file folders upright on a desk?
What office tool is used to emboss a raised seal onto paper as an official mark?
Which office supply is a flat board with a clip at the top for holding papers while writing?
What is a rubber stamp pad (ink pad) used for?
options: Providing ink to coat a rubber stamp before pressing
